name: Minesweeper (itch) (VStudiosCreations)
description:
Minesweeper

Challenge your brain with this classic puzzle game!

Instructions:

- Clear the board by clicking on tiles. Be careful! Clicking on a mine results in game over!

- Numbers shown after clicking on the tile indicate how many mines surround that certain spot

- To flag a tile as a "mine", hold right mouse button and left click

(Note: for best quality and performance, download the executable)
